Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory70.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHuijinNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The sound of a giant machine operating comes through the wall...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...What is that? Another royal guard?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's not it! Something's in the wall...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Royal Guard', 3: 'Executing full alert sequence... Full alert...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before any of you can react, Karenina is transported to another corridor by the rotating trap wall and separated from you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Royal Guard', 3: 'Executing full alert sequence... Full alert...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Lee immediately notices the trap underneath Bianca's feet, but he still cannot catch her in time..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Be careful, everyone. There are traps all over this place.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nanami, we have to protect Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'Why did they not trap the commandant...? Forget it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'It is not a bad idea to keep those Constructs away.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Royal Guard', 3: 'Warning... Golden Vortex... power supply... compromised...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: '(Immediately examines the warning system) That is not possible... Something must be wrong with the warning system...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Pay attention. Something's going on...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The closing trap door on the floor is stuck half-closed with the loss of power.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: '(Orders the rest of the royal guards) "Send royal guards to the weather engine. Investigate the damaged power system."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: '(Continues with her order) "Must recover power. We cannot control the virus if the engines are not sustained."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '(Notices that Nat is distracted) Now!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '(Jumps through the stuck trapdoor) Commandant, this way!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The half-opened door is not big enough for the bigger royal guards to enter.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "(After Lee jumps in) ...I'll bring up the rear. Commandant, you go in first.", 4: '1'}
